name: American Cancer Society Discovery Shop (Menlo Park)
description: Thrift store accepting donations of clothing, accessories, housewares, linens, furniture, and collectibles; proceeds support cancer research and patient programs
fullDescription: The American Cancer Society Discovery Shop in Menlo Park is a thrift store accepting donations and selling quality secondhand items, with proceeds supporting cancer research and patient programs.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept clothing donations
- Accept accessories and housewares
- Accept linens and furniture
- Accept collectibles
- Affordable thrift shopping
- Proceeds fund cancer research
howToGetIt:
1. Visit Discovery Shop location
2. Donate gently used items
3. Or shop for affordable goods
4. Support cancer research
5. All purchases benefit ACS programs
6. Check hours before visiting
address: 891 Santa Cruz Avenue, Menlo Park, CA 94025
